title: The rival Republican conferences: Democrat Tulsi Gabbard and Dr. Oz join the CPAC line-up alongside Trump this weekend - while election fraud critics hold event to back Cheney, Kinzinger and candidates facing MAGA challengers

sentence: But only a few days later, during a segment with Rep. Jim Jordan, Tucker voiced the same sentiment more clearly: “I think we should probably take the side of Russia,” he said, “if we have to choose between Russia and Ukraine.” Despite saying that he was "just kidding" about rooting for Russia over Ukraine, Tucker just doubled down on supporting the Russians in the conflict.
author: Tim Dickinson
title: These Are the American Right-Wingers Covering for Putin as Russia Invades Ukraine

sentence: Rep. Jim Banks, R-Ind., after saying he would “never, ever apologize for objecting” to Biden’s victory Jan. 6, said he and Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, were victimized when they were removed from the House committee investigating that day’s attack on the U.S. Capitol.

title: At CPAC, Ukraine and policy take a back seat to cultural grievances
